TcpIpConnection
TcpIpConnection

A Connection_Impl derived class that represents a tcp/ip connection.

Functions
description
std::string description() override

Gets a description of the connection.

Returns

A description of the connection, in the form "TCP/IP, serverAddress:serverPort".

port
std::string port() const override

Gets a name of the connection port.

Returns

The port name of the connection.

TcpIpConnection
TcpIpConnection(
const std::
string& 
serverAddress,
uint16 
serverPort,
const std::
string& 
interfaceAddress
 = 
""
)

Creates a TcpIpConnection object.

Parameters
serverAddress
const std::string&

The server address (domain name or ip address) to connect to.

serverPort
uint16

The server port to connect to.

interfaceAddress
const std::string&

The address of the specific ethernet adapter to use for the connection (optional).

establishConnection
void establishConnection() override

Initializes and opens the current connection.

Exceptions

  • Error_InvalidTcpServer: the specified server address and/or server port is invalid.

Variables
m_path

The server address (url or ip address).

m_serverPort
uint16 m_serverPort

The server port for the connection.

m_interfaceAddress
std::string m_interfaceAddress

The optional interface to use for the TCP connection.
